title: Is Anivia or Aurelion sol good to climb with?
body: As the title says, just curious.

replies.body: Good gameplay get you out of bronze. Not what champ can get you out. You expect to just face roll and win just because you're are on that champ? If so, then no 1 would be in bronze or get stuck in their Rank.
Anything can get u out of bronze
